moves.1. d4 e6 2. c4 b6: English Defence. A variety of moves are possible here. I chose to transpose to a Q Indian.
moves.8. Bd3: Missing an opportunity to win material by 8.d6.
moves.8... exd5 9. cxd5 d6 10. O-O Nbd7 11. h3: We have now transposed to a Benoni but I was playing it like a K Indian! The bishop should have gone to f4.
Not sure what Black had in mind here but the move looks wrong.
moves.25... axb5 26. Rda1 Rxa1 27. Rxa1 Nf8 28: The rook is better on c6.
